offences.prosecutionFacts: On 01/11/2017 at Chelmsford, the defendant intentionally obstructed a person authorised by BBC in the exercise of a power conferred by virtue of a search warrant issued under section 366 of the Communications Act 2003 by Chelmsford Magistrates Court on 25/10/2017
offences.wording: On 01/11/2017 at Chelmsford intentionally obstructed a person authorised by the BBC in the exercise of a power conferred by virtue of a search warrant issued under section 366 of the Communications Act 2003 by Chelmsford Magistrates Court on 25/10/2017
offences.wordingWelsh: On 01/11/2017 at Chelmsford intentionally obstructed a person authorised by the BBC in the exercise of a power conferred by virtue of a search warrant issued under section 366 of the Communications Act 2003 by Chelmsford Magistrates Court on 25/10/2017
offences.title: Possess / control TV set with intent another use install without a licence
offences.legislation: Contrary to section 363(3)(b) and (4) of the Communications Act 2003.

offences.prosecutionFacts: On 01/11/2017 at Chelmsford, the defendant intentionally obstructed a person authorised by BBC in the exercise of a power conferred by virtue of a search warrant issued under section 366 of the Communications Act 2003 by Chelmsford Magistrates Court on 25/10/2017
offences.wording: On 01/11/2017 at Chelmsford intentionally obstructed a person authorised by the BBC in the exercise of a power conferred by virtue of a search warrant issued under section 366 of the Communications Act 2003 by Chelmsford Magistrates Court on 25/10/2017

offences.title: Weights and measures inspector stamp equipment in contravention of Act / regulation / instrument
offences.titleWelsh: Arolygydd pwysau a mesurau'n stampio cyfarpar yn groes i Ddeddf / rheoliad / offeryn
offences.legislation: Contrary to sections 75(1)(a) and 84(6) of the Weights and Measures Act 1985
offences.legislationWelsh: Yn groes i adrannau 75(1)(a) a 84(6) Deddf Pwysau a Mesurau 1985

offences.prosecutionFacts: On 01/11/2017 at Chelmsford, the defendant rode a pedal cycle on a road and failed to stop when directed by a uniformed police constable
offences.wording: On 01/11/2017 at Chelmsford, being the rider of a cycle on a road, failed to stop on being required to do so
offences.wordingWelsh: On 01/11/2017 at Chelmsford, being the rider of a cycle on a road, failed to stop on being required to do so
offences.title: Ride a pedal cycle on a road and fail to stop when directed by a uniformed police constable / traffic warden
offences.legislation: Contrary to section 163(3) of the Road Traffic Act 1988 and Schedule 2 to the Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988.
offences.legislationWelsh: Yn groes i adran 163(3) Deddf Traffig Ffyrdd 1988 ac Atodlen 2 Deddf Troseddwyr Traffig Ffyrdd 1988.
